Comment: Eliminating any agency that had an investigation against Musk.  His target on USAID was revenge for USAID being one of the weapons that brought down South African apartheid. In the 1980s, USAID began funding South African NGOs that supported nonviolent resistance, community organizing, legal aid, and human rights documentation. USAID funded educational exchanges and training for Black South Africans, helping to build a future leadership class for a post-apartheid society. Programs like the South African Manpower Development sent promising Black students abroad for higher education and leadership training.  After Nelson Mandela‚Äôs release in 1990 and the beginning of political negotiations, USAID increased support for transition-related efforts, including voter education, election monitoring, and institution building.
